version_description:
+ Performance Improvements
+ Minor Bug fixes

+ Challenge your friends online
+ Minor bug fixes
+ Reduced memory usage.

+ 2 new characters! meet Ninja Soldier and Ninja Sparrow
+ New daily bonus!
+ Free coin packs!
+ Minor bug fixes
+ Important performance improvements

+ New Characters!
+ New Scenery!
+ Lots of new pets to collect!
+ Daily special events! amazing offers and surprises!

+ 5 new characters to unlock!
+ French localization

+ iOS 9 compatibility
+ Bug Fixes
+ Performance improvements

+ Now optimized for iOS 10
+ Bug fixes
+ Performance improvements

We update the game regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements. Thanks for playing Ninja Kid!

+ VR Mode, play on your favorite headset!
+ Bug fixes
+ Performance improvements
+ Redesigned screens
